@Sian29337182 @StinkStopthe @nicolas32140480 @stwater @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency Buck passing again.
Round and round we go 
Where it stops nobody knows 
When will someone pick up the reins and start actually doing something?! üò°üëé

@Sian29337182 @StinkStopthe @nicolas32140480 @stwater @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency I can't see the residents or group tiring of being poisoned everyday somehow  - or kicking up a stink about the toxic stench.

This was similar to the impression @stwater gave me: they say they don‚Äôt know how much sewage goes into our rivers and say it is @EnvAgency job to check. Not good enough >>>>Raw sewage breaches in UK rivers 10 times greater than watchdog estimates https://t.co/vmUizYeLTE

urls.title: Raw sewage breaches in UK rivers 10 times greater than watchdog estimates
urls.description: In 2020 there were 160 breaches of Environment Agency permits to release sewage into rivers, UCL professor tells MPs

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @nicolas32140480 @RedIndustries2 Deluded... I wish they would concentrate their efforts into addressing the stench and breaches... but then they would need to recognise they have a problem first... anymore breaches this week @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/tHa7iw7Md5

@nicolas32140480 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 There‚Äôs no gas here right now so I‚Äôm down to using my inhaler every hour now to combat the after effects, rather than constantly, which is nice!
Now wondering why they‚Äôre dumping in cell 3 and stuff not from their own sites though!

Newcastle community feeling ill, lethargic,headaches-just a routine day in the town violated by unsafe levels of landfill gases consistently dismissed by the @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland Any action now is too little too late - cap it, close it & restore it @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/2Fm6viQRMI

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @Cap_it_off It wakes us in middle of night if it hasn't stopped arrived before bedtime, our bodies won't let us sleep with that toxic gas in our lungs,fight or flight instinct tells us you can't breathe get out, #stopthestink

@RosieP4 @Thoro_green @Nick_Unsworth @R4BDg @BWLabour @SarahPhillips8 @RossPlayle @BW_Times As previously advised, I am not in favour of the flood scheme, as so far proposed, & am already discussing, with @EnvAgency ; landowners & @Essex_CC officers, ways of providing a more natural alternative, working with nature & spreading the impacts.

tweets.text: @lauraepolicy @SaveLeaMarshes @EnvAgency Which @EnvAgency specific practices? It's a rather sweeping statement !  Yes - biological monitoring is preferable in many ways, but chemical sampling & analysis (of sediments/biota/effluents) has immense power to nail down pollutants and sources.

We‚Äôre really excited to be leading on this project (with the help of a great team) to help protect wildlife & habitats across the UK. More info coming soon! @BristolWater @Earthwatch_Eur @EnvAgency @lborouniversity @NatResWales @The_RRC @wessexwater @HuddersfieldUni @SESWater https://t.co/mGhpGAnT24
